import React, { Fragment, useContext } from "react"; import { useNavigate, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import "./style.css"; import { logout } from "./Action"; import { LayoutContext } from "../index"; import { isAdmin } from "../auth/fetchApi"; const Navber = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const location = useLocation(); const { data, dispatch } = useContext(LayoutContext); const navberToggleOpen = () => dispatch({ type: "hamburgerToggle", payload: !data.navberHamburger }); const cartModalOpen = () => dispatch({ type: "cartModalToggle", payload: !data.cartModal }); return (
navigate("/")} > Shop navigate("/blog")} > Blog navigate("/contact-us")} > Contact us
navigate("/")} style={{ letterSpacing: "0.10rem" }} className="font-bold uppercase text-gray-800 text-2xl cursor-pointer px-2" > Hayroo
navigate("/")} style={{ letterSpacing: "0.70rem" }} className="hidden lg:block col-span-1 text-center text-gray-800 font-bold tracking-widest uppercase text-2xl cursor-pointer" > Hayroo
{/* Wishlist */}
navigate("/wish-list")} className="hover:bg-gray-200 rounded-lg px-2 py-2 cursor-pointer" title="Wishlist" >
{localStorage.getItem("jwt") ? ( {/* Logged In Dropdown */}
    {isAdmin() ? (
  • navigate("/admin/dashboard")} className="py-2 px-8 hover:bg-gray-400 cursor-pointer" > Admin Panel
    • ) : ( <>
  • navigate("/user/orders")} className="py-2 px-8 hover:bg-gray-400 cursor-pointer" > My Orders
  • navigate("/user/profile")} className="py-2 px-8 hover:bg-gray-400 cursor-pointer" > My Account
  • navigate("/user/setting")} className="py-2 px-8 hover:bg-gray-400 cursor-pointer" > Settings
    • )}
  • Logout
) : ( {/* Login */}
navigate("/admin/login")} className="cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-200 px-2 py-2 rounded-lg" title="Login" >
{/* Signup */}
navigate("/admin/signup")} className="cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-200 px-2 py-2 rounded-lg" title="Signup" >
)} {/* Cart */}
{data.cartProduct ? data.cartProduct.length : 0}
{/* Mobile Dropdown Menu */}
navigate("/")} className="text-lg font-medium tracking-widest hover:text-gray-800 hover:bg-gray-200 px-3 py-2 rounded-lg cursor-pointer" > Shop navigate("/blog")} className="text-lg font-medium tracking-widest hover:text-gray-800 hover:bg-gray-200 px-3 py-2 rounded-lg cursor-pointer" > Blog navigate("/contact-us")} className="text-lg font-medium tracking-widest hover:text-gray-800 hover:bg-gray-200 px-3 py-2 rounded-lg cursor-pointer" > Contact us
); }; export default Navber;
